Text: The pages after page 479 are blank.Could you please check this and if this is true,re-upload this book.

Had you been familiar with the DJVU format, it would have instantly rung a bell when the compressor outputted this small on such a large and complex PDF.

Scraping trackers (DHT and PEX excluded), more than a 1,000 copies ( > 18 GB) of junk so far and no sign of stopping/removal on any index. How sad...
